name: tailwind-to-object
description: Convert Tailwind classNames into CSS objects

scripts.build: npm run tailwind-generate && npm run doc-generate && tsc
scripts.patch: npm t && npm version patch && npm run build && npm publish && git push && git push --tags
scripts.minor: npm t && npm version minor && npm run build && npm publish && git push && git push --tags
scripts.BREAKING-major: npm t && npm version major && npm run build && npm publish && git push && git push --tags

author: Andrii Gubanov
